original_text: They arrived at a town called Salamis. There they went into the Jewish meeting places and they told the people God's message about Jesus. John Mark went with Barnabas and Saul to help them with their work.
korean_text: 살라미에 이르러 하나님의 말씀을 유대인의 여러 회당에서 전할새 요한을 수행원으로 두었더라

sentences.original_text: They arrived at a town called Salamis
There they went into the Jewish meeting places
and they told the people God's message about Jesus
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 사람들에게 예수님에 대한 하나님의 메시지를 전했습니다

sentences.original_text: John Mark went with Barnabas and Saul
sentences.korean_translation: 요한 마르가가 바나바와 사울과 함께 갔습니다

sentences.original_text: to help them with their work
